titleStmt.title: An answer to several remarks upon Dr. Henry More, his expositions of the Apocalypse and Daniel, as also upon his Apology written by S.E. Mennonite, and published in English by the answerer ; whereunto are annexed two small pieces, Arithmetica apocalyptica, and Appendicula apocalyptica ...
titleStmt.author: S. E., Mennonite.
More, Henry, 1614-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Miles Flesher, for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
